meanings.definition: The practice of being self-sufficient or self-reliant.
meanings.sent1: Her autecisms in growing her own food and making her clothes impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The community admired his autecisms in living off the grid.
meanings.sent3: His autecisms in fixing things around the house saved them a lot of money.
meanings.sent4: Her autecisms in navigating the wilderness were like a compass guiding others.
meanings.sent5: The boy's autecisms in building a treehouse were the talk of the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A unique characteristic or trait that sets someone or something apart.
meanings.sent1: The autecisms of her artwork made it stand out among the rest.
meanings.sent2: His autecisms in storytelling captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's autecisms of walking on two legs amused the family.
meanings.sent4: Her autecisms in problem-solving were like a secret weapon.
meanings.sent5: The autecisms of the old house gave it a mysterious charm.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of individualism or uniqueness.
meanings.sent1: Her autecisms in fashion design were ahead of their time.
meanings.sent2: The school encouraged students to embrace their autecisms.
meanings.sent3: His autecisms in creating new recipes always surprised his friends.
meanings.sent4: The artist's autecisms in painting were a reflection of his soul.
meanings.sent5: The autecisms of the small town made it a hidden gem.
